name: land_cover_classification
description:
This block takes an AOI clipped image and runs land cover classification on it.
The classification is a simple unsupervised K-means clustering in the color space of the image.
The number of clusters and other parameters can be specified for the classification.

n_clusters.description: The number of clusters for the K-means clustering

n_iterations.description: The number of iterations for the K-means clustering

n_sieve_pixels.description: Minimum number of pixels in each patch for the classification
